182177.「そないに 笑ってられるんは 今日までや。: You can only smile like that until today.

182179.「急だったから びっくりしちゃった！\n もしかして 遊びにきてくれたの……？:
I was so surprised at your suddenness! Did you
come to visit me?

182181.「今日は 陽衆の皆さんに \n 招待状を 渡しにまいりましたんえ。:
I'm here today to extend an invitation to all
of Yang Clan.

182182.「間もなく……天地の儀を 再演します。:
Soon... we will reenact the Heaven and Earth
Ceremony.

182184.「天地の儀のせいで ヨイちゃんの\n お父さんは……。:
Because of the Heaven and Earth ceremony,
Yoi's father...

182185.「この際やし 言うとくわ。 \n ウチは あんたの善人面が 大っ嫌いやねん。:
I'll say this now. I don't like your good guy
side.

182186.「光の中で すくすく 育って\n いっぺんの よどみも あらしまへん！\n って:
Growing up so fast in the light, not a single
stutter! I can't see a single stutter.

182187.「そんなこと……ないよ！\n あたしにも 嫌なとこ いっぱいあるよ。:
That's not true! There are many things I don't
like about myself.

182188.「せやな。自分のあやまちを\n 忘れたような 顔しとるとことか。:
That's right. You look as if you've forgotten
your own mistakes.

182190.「儀式の場所は 陰陽の気が混じりあう\n 落陽の草原の西。見届け役として\n ニ:
The ceremony will take place in the west of the Sunset Meadow, a place where the yin and yang chi merge. Mr. Nikoroi will be there to
witness the ceremony.

182191.「これは 陰衆のための祭り。\n 陰衆の手で すべてを 取り仕切ります。:
This is a festival for the Yinshu. The hands
of the Yinshu are in charge of everything.

182192.「つまり 陰衆が 陽衆にとってかわり \n 表舞台に 姿を現すってことどす。:
In other words, the Yin Clan will replace the
Yang Clan and appear on the stage.

182193.「あんたらは せいぜい \n 目に焼きつけはれば よろしおす。:
You guys should just burn it in your eyes as
best you can.

182194.「……陽衆が陰にのまれる その時を。:
...when the Yang Clan will be swallowed up by
the Yin.

182196.<center>ヨイ……。\nワイを超える 天地雷鳴士になりや。: Yoi... be a better druid than I am.

182197.「来たぞ 天地雷鳴士よ……。\n この場所で 天地の儀を おこなうのだな。:
Here I come, Druid... in this place you will
perform the Ceremony of Heaven and Earth.

182198.「天地雷鳴士 陰衆の前頭領\n オウマが娘……ヨイにございます。:
Druid: Ouma, the former chieftain of the
Yinshu, is the daughter...of Yoi.

182199.「かような草深い地に ご足労いただいて \n 国王様には 御礼もうしあげます。:
I would like to thank you, Your Majesty, for
your visit to such a grassy place.

182200.「……おもてを 上げよ。 \n そなたの父のこと まことに残念であった。:
Lift up your heads. I was very sorry to hear
about your father.

182201.「陰衆の復権は 父の悲願。\n その想いを 今日 かなえとうございます。:
It's my father's long-cherished wish that the
Yinshu be restored. Today, I'd like to fulfill
that wish.

182202.「天地の儀に 成功した あかつきには…… \n どうか 陰衆を 王家のおかかえに:
Hit by the success of the Heaven and Earth
Ceremony, please make Yinshu a member of the
royal family.

182203.「……ふむ。\n 天地の儀は 大幻魔テンオツキジンを 招いて\n 天地万物の気を:
...Hmm. The Heaven and Earth Ceremony is an important ritual that invites the Great Genshin Tenotsukijin to bring heaven and earth
into balance.

182204.「そなたが この儀式を 見事にこなし \n カミハルムイに 恩恵をもたらすのなら:
If you will perform this ritual with
distinction and bring Kamiharmui a boon I will
consider that as well.

182206.「これより……天地の儀を 始めますえ。:
We will now begin the ceremony of heaven and
earth.

182211.「やった……！\n ウチが 大幻魔を 降ろしたんや！: I did it! I brought down the Great Demon!

182214.「この感じ……あの時と同じ。 \n 荒ぶる悪霊になった テンオツキジンだよ……。:
This feeling...just like that time. I'm a
raging evil spirit. I'm Tenotsukijin...

182216.「だって……あん時 失敗したんは \n あんたが 呪文をかんだからやん！:
Because... the only reason you failed that
time was because you bit on a spell!

182217.<center>……愚かな小娘よ。\n往きし時も 今も……変わらぬ。:
...you foolish girl. When I was, I am... the
same.

182220.<center>貴様の心には 濃き陰があった。\n陽衆より 認められたい……とい:
There was a thick shadow in your heart. A
strong desire to be recognized above the Yang
Clan.

182221.<center>天地の儀は 陰と陽が 等しく\n交じりあわねば 成り立たぬのだ…:
The heaven and earth must be equally
intermingled in order for the yin and yang to
exist...

182223.「父上を……殺したんは…………。: The man who... killed your father...

182224.「ヨイちゃん！！\n それ以上 陰を背負っちゃだめだよ。: Yoi! Don't take on any more shade.

182225.「悲しみや憎しみは 陰の気を増やしちゃう。\n もう 苦しまないで！！:
Sadness and hatred increase the negative chi.
Don't suffer anymore!

182226.「光があるから 影ができる……。\n あたしたち ふたりで ひとつのはずなのに。:
Because there is light, there is shadow... We
are supposed to be one, but we are not.

182227.「どうして わかりあえないんだろう……。: Why can't we understand each other?

182228.「……わかりあおうと しなかったからだよね。 \n <pc>には つらいことや\:
It's because you didn't try to understand each
other. I could have told <pc> about
my pain and suffering.

182229.「ねえ ヨイちゃん！\n あたしは 陽衆と陰衆を ひとつにしたい！:
Hey, Yoi! I want to unite the Yang Clan and
the Yin Clan!

182230.「だから あなたの苦しみから生まれた\n 陰を 一緒に 背負うよ！:
So I will bear with you the shadows born of
your suffering!

182231.<center>貴様らの手には 負えん……。\n我は 世に生じた 厄を統べる神な:
I am not in your hands, for I am the god who
rules over all the ills that have come into
the world.

182232.<center>幾度 来ようとも 同じことだ。:
No matter how many times I come back, it's the
same.

182233.<center>貴様らの手には 負えん……。\n我は 世に生じた 厄を統べる神な:
I am not in your hands, for I am the god who
rules over all the ills that have come into
the world.

182234.<center>陰と陽のチカラが よどみなく 交わり\nひとつに なっている……:
The power of yin and yang mingle and become
one...

182236.<center>おのれの陰を 知るからこそ……\n光は より 強くなる……。:
It is only when you know your shadow that the
light becomes stronger.

182237.「陰と陽 ふたつを 等しく備えた者……。\n それを 天地雷鳴士と 呼ぶのだな。:
One who possesses both yin and yang in equal
measure... that's what you call a druid.

182241.「あたしたち……もっと お話ししよ。\n 悲しみも苦しみも 分けあえるよ……。:
Let's talk more. We can share our sorrows and
pains.

182242.「このたびは 天地雷鳴士のいさかいに\n 国王様を 巻き込み 申し訳ございません:
I apologize for involving His Majesty the King
in Druid's tussle.

182243.「我らは 進むべき道を あやまったようです。\n どうか……陽衆を\n 王家のお:
It seems we have apologized for the path we
have taken. Please remove Yang Clan from the
royal family.

182244.「……このたびの 失態を思えば \n そなたが そう言いだすのも\n やむをえぬ:
I can't blame you for saying so, considering
your recent fiasco.

182245.「だが カミハルムイ王家は 千年もの昔から\n 天地雷鳴士に 支えられてきた。:
But the Kamiharmui royal family has been
supported by the druids for a thousand years.

182246.「……そなたらが ひとつになりし時\n ふたたび チカラを借りることとしよう。:
When you become one, I will ask for your help
again.

182251.「今日は……陽衆の隠れ家に 帰ろっか。:
Today...let's go back to the Yang Clan
Hideout.

182252.「ヨイ……アサヒ……。 \n そうか……オウマ わしは……わしは……: Yoi... Asahi... well... Ouma, I... I...

182255.「わしと ヨイの父……オウマは \n 幼きおり たがいの素性も知らぬままに\n:
I and Yoi's father, Ouma, were childhood friends who shared the same playground in the fields and mountains without knowing each
other's true identity.

182256.「オウマは 夜になると夢幻の森へ帰っていった。\n それを 子供心に 不思議に思:
Ouma returned to the Dream Forest at night. I
used to wonder about that as a child.

182257.「やがて 成長した後 我が友こそが…… \n 陽衆に しいたげられてきた 天地雷:
When I grew up, I learned that my friend was
the chieftain of the Yin sect, an offshoot of
the Yang Clan druids.

182258.「……わしは 我が友に 哀れみを覚えた。: I felt pity for my friend.

182259.「それは おごった考えだったかもしれぬが\n わしは友に いつか 陽衆と陰衆\n:
It may have been a conceited idea, but I vowed to my friend that one day I would create an era in which the Yang Clan and the Yin Clan
would work hand in hand.

182260.「そして ついに あの天地の儀の日が来た。:
And finally, the day of that heaven and earth
ceremony arrived.

182261.「儀式の中で わしは ヨイの内の陰が \n 陽の気を食らっていくのに 気づいた。:
During the ritual, I noticed that the yin in
Yoi was eating away at the yang chi.

182262.「オウマは 悪霊から アサヒをかばい\n こときれておった……。\n 父のなきが:
Ouma was so angry that he had to cover Asahi
from the evil spirits... and when I saw Yoi
clinging to the remains of his father, I...

182263.「……わしは 真実を伝えることが\n できんかった。: I could not tell the truth.

182264.「しいたげられつづけた友の 忘れ形見の幼子に \n 父を殺したのは……お前である:
I could not tell the little child, the memento
of a tortured friend, that it was you who
killed his father...

182265.「そして 代わりに その責を負ったのは\n 我が娘……アサヒだった。:
Instead, it was my daughter, Asahi, who took
the blame.

182266.「アサヒは オウマの死の 元凶とされ\n ヨイや 陰衆の者たちから 恨みを買った:
Asahi was blamed for Ouma's death, and he was
resented by Yoi and the rest of the
underworld.

182267.「わしは 娘の苦しみを 知りながらも\n 何も 言えんかった……。:
I knew what she was going through, but I
couldn't say anything.

182268.「それは 陽衆の頭としてでも\n 父親としてでもない……:
It is not as the head of Yang Clan, nor as a
father...

182269.「ただひとりの友への 罪悪感にとらわれた\n 愚かな男の 罪滅ぼしだった。:
It was atonement for the sins of a foolish
man, obsessed with guilt over his only friend.

182272.「あの時の ヨイちゃんは……\n 真実を聞いたら きっと壊れちゃってた。:
Yoi at that time...I'm sure she would have
broken down if she heard the truth.

182273.「お父ちゃんは あたしの大切な友達を\n 守ってくれたんだ……。: Your father protected my dearest friend...

182274.「ヨイちゃんのためなら あたしは\n 悪く言われるくらい へっちゃらだもの。:
For Yoi's sake, I don't mind being called bad
things.

182276.「陰と陽をそなえた人が そばに いてくれたから\n あたしは いつのまにか 救わ:
I was saved because I had someone with both
yin and yang by my side.
